effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Hurls mud at the foe and
reduces SPEED.

Hurls mud at the foe and
reduces SPEED.

The user attacks by
hurling mud.
It also reduces the
foe’s SPEED.

The user attacks by
hurling a blob of mud
at the foe.
It also reduces the
target’s Speed.

The user attacks by
hurling a blob of mud
at the foe.
It also reduces the
target’s Speed.

The user attacks by
hurling a blob of mud
at the foe.
It also reduces the
target’s Speed.

Le lanceur attaque en projetant
de la boue sur l’ennemi. Réduit
aussi la Vitesse de la cible.

The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud
at the target.
It also reduces the target’s Speed.

The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud
at the target.
It also reduces the target’s Speed.

どろの　かたまりを
あいてに　なげつけて　こうげきする。
どうじに　あいての　すばやさを　さげる。

진흙 덩어리를
상대에게 내던져서 공격한다.
동시에 상대의 스피드를 떨어뜨린다.

Le lanceur attaque en projetant de la boue sur
l’ennemi. Réduit aussi la Vitesse de la cible.

Angriff mit Lehm, der den Initiative-Wert
des Zieles senkt.

El usuario lanza lodo al objetivo y reduce su
Velocidad.

Chi la usa attacca lanciando fango sul bersaglio,
riducendone anche la Velocità.

The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud
at the target.
This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

泥の　塊を
相手に　投げつけて　攻撃する。
同時に　相手の　素早さを　さげる。

どろの　かたまりを
あいてに　なげつけて　こうげきする。
どうじに　あいての　すばやさを　さげる。

상대에게 내던져서 공격한다.
동시에 상대의 스피드를 떨어뜨린다.

向對手投擲

同時降低對手的速度。
